title: Checking out EdgeDB - The Developer Database (Better than Prisma ORM?!)

media:group.media:title: Checking out EdgeDB - The Developer Database (Better than Prisma ORM?!)
media:group.media:description:
EdgeDB is a next-generation database that gives developers superpowers. It takes the tools and features you know and love — declarative schema, interactive migrations, deep querying, introspection, and more — and bakes them directly into the database.

- Built on top of Postgres
- Powerful, readable query language
- GraphQL out of the box
- Strict, consistent type system
- First-party migration system

#database #edgedb
